amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to provide to a Transportation Security Officer, Behavior Detection Officer, or other employee of the Transportation Security Administration (1) a badge or shield; or (2) a uniform with epaulets or a badge tab.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to provide a Transportation Security Officer, Behavior Detection Officer, or other employee of the Transportation Security Administration 1) a badge or shield; or 2) a uniform with epaulets or a badge tab.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 282 (Roll no. 364).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 131 - 282 (Roll no. 364).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
